ygData.subject: RE: Incandescent Mask: Does anyone have details on this?
ygData.msgSnippet: Directions: Find your way to the scryer room. Head down the ramp from the scryer room. This leads to a rectangular room with pillars. There is an exit across
ygData.messageBody:
Directions:
Find your way to the scryer room.
Head down the ramp from the scryer room. This leads to a rectangular room
with pillars. There is an exit across from the ramp. Take it and follow the
wall to your right.
The next "room" is the heart spider room. As the previous message said you
have to go underwater here to get to the monk.

Mawrin.

> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
> I do, but its hard to explain......
> there is a room called the spider room in upper. there is water below
> this.....in the water, there is a passage that takes you to a
> room with him
> in there.
>
> he is there with a pet, and another mob....i suggest taking a group
> depending on your level.
>
> > From: "steve clary" <sclary@...>
> >
> > This item looks aawesome but I have never seen a skeletal monk in
> > Upper guk before. Does anyone know where you find him?
> >
